verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-Mor, A Psalm לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. [and] Song לְךָ֤ le-Cha דֻֽמִיָּ֬ה <S%H1747><s%> du-mi-Yah waiteth תְהִלָּ֓ה <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah Praise אֱלֹ֘הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him for thee O God בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon; in Sion וּ֝לְךָ֗ u-le-cha, יְשֻׁלַּם־ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shul-lam- be performed נֶֽדֶר׃ <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der. and unto thee shall the vow

שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> sho-Me-a' O thou that hearest תְּפִלָּ֑ה <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah; prayer עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <S%H5704><s%> 'a-Dei-cha, to You כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בָּשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar unto thee shall all flesh יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u. come

דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei act עֲ֭וֹנֹת <S%H5771><s%> 'A-vo-not Iniquities גָּ֣בְרוּ <S%H1396><s%> Ga-ve-ru prevail מֶ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> Men-ni; against פְּ֝שָׁעֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6588><s%> pe-sha-'Ei-nu, against me [as for] our transgressions אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You תְכַפְּרֵֽם׃ <S%H3722><s%> te-chap-pe-Rem. thou shalt purge them away

אַשְׁרֵ֤י׀ <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed תִּֽבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> tiv-Char [is the man whom] thou choosest וּתְקָרֵב֮ <S%H7126><s%> u-te-ka-Rev and causest to approach יִשְׁכֹּ֪ן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon [unto thee that] he may dwell חֲצֵ֫רֶ֥יךָ <S%H2691><s%> cha-Tze-Rei-cha in thy courts נִ֭שְׂבְּעָה <S%H7646><s%> Nis-be-'ah we shall be satisfied בְּט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> be-Tuv with the goodness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha; of thy house קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Dosh, [even] of thy holy הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1964><s%> hei-cha-Le-cha. temple

נ֤וֹרָא֨וֹת׀ <S%H3372><s%> no-ra-'ot [By] terrible things בְּצֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> be-Tze-dek in righteousness תַּ֭עֲנֵנוּ <S%H6030><s%> Ta-'a-ne-nu wilt thou answer אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'E-nu; of our salvation מִבְטָ֥ח <S%H4009><s%> miv-Tach [who art] the confidence כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all קַצְוֵי־ <S%H7099><s%> katz-vei- of all the ends אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, of the earth וְיָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> ve-Yam [upon] the sea רְחֹקִֽים׃ <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kim. and of them that are afar off

מֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> me-Chin setteth fast הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim the mountains בְּכֹח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> be-cho-Cho; Which by his strength נֶ֝אְזָ֗ר <S%H247><s%> ne'-Zar, [being] girded בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1369><s%> big-vu-Rah. with power

מַשְׁבִּ֤יחַ׀ <S%H7623><s%> mash-Bi-ach Which stilleth שְׁא֣וֹן <S%H7588><s%> she-'on the noise יַ֭מִּים <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mim of the seas שְׁא֥וֹן <S%H7588><s%> she-'on the noise גַּלֵּיהֶ֗ם <S%H1530><s%> gal-lei-Hem, of their waves וַהֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> va-ha-Mon and the tumult לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> le-'um-Mim. of the people

וַיִּ֤ירְא֨וּ׀ <S%H3372><s%> vai-Yi-re-'U are afraid יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei They also that dwell קְ֭צָוֹת <S%H7098><s%> Ke-tza-vot coast מֵאוֹתֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H226><s%> me-'o-to-Tei-cha; at thy tokens מ֤וֹצָֽאֵי־ <S%H4161><s%> Mo-tza-'ei- thou makest the outgoings בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Vo-ker of the morning וָעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> va-'E-rev and evening תַּרְנִֽין׃ <S%H7442><s%> tar-Nin. to rejoice

פָּקַ֥דְתָּ <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kad-ta Thou visitest הָאָ֨רֶץ׀ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the earth וַתְּשֹׁ֪קְקֶ֡הָ <S%H7783><s%> vat-te-Sho-ke-Ke-ha and waterest רַבַּ֬ת <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bat it thou greatly תַּעְשְׁרֶ֗נָּה <S%H6238><s%> ta'-she-Ren-nah, enrichest פֶּ֣לֶג <S%H6388><s%> Pe-leg it with the river אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God מָ֣לֵא <S%H4390><s%> Ma-le [which] is full מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water תָּכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> ta-Chin thou preparest דְּ֝גָנָ֗ם <S%H1715><s%> de-ga-Nam, them corn כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> chen thus תְּכִינֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> te-chi-Ne-ha. when thou hast so provided

תְּלָמֶ֣יהָ <S%H8525><s%> te-la-Mei-ha the ridges רַ֭וֵּה <S%H7301><s%> Rav-veh thereof abundantly נַחֵ֣ת <S%H5181><s%> na-Chet thou settlest גְּדוּדֶ֑יהָ <S%H1417><s%> ge-du-Dei-ha; ridges בִּרְבִיבִ֥ים <S%H7241><s%> bir-vi-Vim with showers תְּ֝מֹגְגֶ֗נָּה <S%H4127><s%> te-mo-ge-Gen-nah, thereof thou makest it soft צִמְחָ֥הּ <S%H6780><s%> tzim-Chah the springing תְּבָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> te-va-Rech. thou blessest

עִ֭טַּרְתָּ <S%H5849><s%> 'It-tar-ta Thou crownest שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> she-Nat the year טוֹבָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2896><s%> toa-Te-cha; with thy goodness וּ֝מַעְגָּלֶ֗יךָ <S%H4570><s%> u-ma'-ga-Lei-cha, and thy paths יִרְעֲפ֥וּן <S%H7491><s%> yir-'a-Fun drop דָּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1880><s%> Da-shen. fatness

יִ֭רְעֲפוּ <S%H7491><s%> Yir-'a-fu They drop נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> ne-'ot [upon] the pastures מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar; of the wilderness וְ֝גִ֗יל <S%H1524><s%> ve-Gil, rejoice גְּבָע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ge-va-'ot and the little hills תַּחְגֹּֽרְנָה׃ <S%H2296><s%> tach-Go-re-nah. on every side

לָבְשׁ֬וּ <S%H3847><s%> la-ve-Shu are clothed כָרִ֨ים׀ <S%H3733><s%> cha-Rim The pastures הַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, with flocks וַעֲמָקִ֥ים <S%H6010><s%> va-'a-ma-Kim the valleys יַֽעַטְפוּ־ <S%H5848><s%> ya-'at-fu- also are covered over בָ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> Var; with corn יִ֝תְרוֹעֲע֗וּ <S%H7321><s%> yit-ro-'a-'U, they shout for joy אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- yes יָשִֽׁירוּ׃ <S%H7891><s%> ya-Shi-ru. they also sing
